channel.title: Error Connecting [PI] ( URGENT )
channel.description: hey i just downloaded a new source but when i changed the IP to 0.0.0.0 to LocalHost and everything it keeps saying error connecting... any ideas why is that ? :O please i need help urgently.

item.title: Error Connecting [PI] ( URGENT )
item.dc:creator: @iz3_legend iz3 legend
item.description:
@iz3_legend wrote:

step 1. Go to your source and run your server it should say
serverip listening on port ******

if that port is 5555 go to client.java (client sides) and change the current port to that. Visae Versa too.

and make sure the server ip is either 0.0.0.0 or 127.0.0.1 test both of those. If it still doesn’t work id recommned downloading a new server.

Read full topic
